      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Clear both the in memory and on disk compiled script caches. Files on disk will be treated as if they are new and recompiled.

      • compile

        public CompiledScript compile(String lang,
                     String script,
                     ScriptService.ScriptType scriptType)
        Compiles a script straight-away, or returns the previously compiled and cached script, without checking if it can be executed based on settings.
